reviewText:
'Hot Under The Collar' is just fun. If your going to see this film for whatever reason, personally I hired it to see Mindy Clarke and I was just in histerics. Mainly because Mindy is SOOOOOO funny- she really has a gift for comedy. So if you just want to laugh, even if it seems silly just go for it- definitely for the lovely mindy Clarke. Who didn't love the scene when Mindy as Monica says in the convent says about ''Who could be more studlier than God?''.
By Justine Ryan
